mapper.select: select bi.*, c.name as category_name, c.src as category_name from bucket_item bi left join category c on bi.category_idx = c.idx order by bi.idx

mapper.insert: insert into bucket_item(member_idx, category_idx, title, status, src, created_at) values (#{member_idx}, #{category_idx}, #{title}, #{status}, #{src}, #{created_at})
